Abilities.Name: Dagger Attack
Abilities.Description: The Hero stabs the enemy with his dagger.

Abilities.Name: Ranged Attack
Abilities.Description: The Hero shoots the enemy with his bow.

Abilities.Name: Power Shot
Abilities.Description: The Hero uses a great amount of strength to draw the bow, unleashing a powerful arrow.

Effects.Name: Power Shot Mastery
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds .1 to the Strength Factor of this ability

Effects.Name: Draw Power
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds 5 to the Stamina Cost of this ability

Effects.Name: Draw Power
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds .2 to the Range of this ability

Abilities.Name: Light Footed
Abilities.Description: The Hero's agility allows him to move more often.

Effects.Name: Agile
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability decreases his initiative by 10 percent

Abilities.Name: Sprinter
Abilities.Description: The Hero's natural speed allows him to move further.

Effects.Name: Usain Bolt
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases his movement by 1

Abilities.Name: Precision
Abilities.Description: The Hero puts extra effort into making sure his arrows find their mark.

Effects.Name: One Shot, One Kill
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases the Strength Factor on his Bow attacks by 5%

Effects.Name: Aiming Isn't Easy
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases the Stamina Cost on his Bow attacks by 2.5%

Abilities.Name: Crippling Strike
Abilities.Description: The Hero scores critical hits to his opponents legs, rendering them unable to move.

Effects.Name: Crippling Strike Mastery
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds .1 to the Strength Factor of this ability

Effects.Name: Price of Precision
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds 2.5 to the Stamina Cost of this ability

Effects.Name: Cripple
Effects.Description: This ability robs an enemy of 99 movement
